welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Monica, where the sun always shines and the beach is just the beginning of our city's charm. Enjoy exploring our famous pier, beautiful coastline, and vibrant culture during your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for Aer Lingus, Aeromexico, and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, Copa Airlines, and Great Lakes Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and some domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours of free access per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport offers a small waiting area and check-in counters for flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at El Monte Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
